AnyLicenseInfoType.name: AnyLicenseInfoType
AnyLicenseInfoType.documentation: A data type for AnyLicenseInfo type

ComplexType.name: AnyLicenseInfo
ComplexType.comment: The AnyLicenseInfo class includes all resources that represent licensing information.

IsDeprecatedLicenseIDType.documentation: A data type that indicates if the license id is Deprecated.

ComplexType.name: IsDeprecatedLicenseIDType
ComplexType.comment: Indicates if the license is is Deprecated.

IsFsfLibreType.name: IsFsfLibreType

ComplexType.name: IsFsfLibre
ComplexType.comment: Indicates if the license is is FSF Libre.

IsOsiApprovedIndicatorType.name: IsOsiApprovedIndicatorType
IsOsiApprovedIndicatorType.documentation: A data type for Indicates if the OSI has approved the license.

ComplexType.name: isOsiApproved
ComplexType.comment: Indicates if the OSI has approved the license.

LicenseIDType.name: LicenseIDType
LicenseIDType.documentation: A data type for A human readable short form license identifier for a license. The license ID is iether on the standard license oist or the form LicenseRef-[idString] where [idString] is a unique string containing letters, numbers, ., - or +.

ComplexType.name: licenseId
ComplexType.comment: A human readable short form license identifier for a license. The license ID is iether on the standard license oist or the form "LicenseRef-"[idString] where [idString] is a unique string containing letters, numbers, ".", "-" or "+".

LicenseTextType.name: LicenseTextType
LicenseTextType.documentation: A data type for Full text of the license.

LicenseType.name: LicenseType
LicenseType.documentation: A data type for License type

ComplexType.name: License
ComplexType.comment: A License represents a copyright license. The SPDX license list website is annotated with these properties (using RDFa) to allow license data published there to be easily processed. The license list is populated in accordance with the License List fields guidelines. These guidelines are not normative and may change over time. SPDX tooling should not rely on values in the license list conforming to the current guidelines.

NameType.name: NameType
NameType.documentation: A data type for The full human readable name of the item. This should include version information when applicable.

ComplexType.name: name
ComplexType.comment: The full human readable name of the item. This should include version information when applicable.

SeeAlsoURIType.name: SeeAlsoURIType
SeeAlsoURIType.documentation: A data type for rdfs:seeAlso is an instance of rdf:Property that is used to indicate a resource that might provide additional information about the subject resource.

ComplexType.name: seeAlso
ComplexType.comment: rdfs:seeAlso is an instance of rdf:Property that is used to indicate a resource that might provide additional information about the subject resource.

SimpleLicensingInfoType.documentation: A data type for SimpleLicensingInfo type

ComplexType.name: SimpleLicenseingInfo
ComplexType.comment: The SimpleLicenseInfo class includes all resources that represent simple, atomic, licensing information.

The license list is populated in accordance with the License List fields guidelines. These guidelines are not normative and may change over time. SPDX tooling should not rely on values in the license list conforming to the current guidelines.
